name: Business Administration Master Skills_Mar.2023
description: The Business Administration Master collection represents the core skills necessary for professionals responsible for key leadership roles in organizations. It includes invaluable MBA skills that support the evolving business industry such as Communications, Management, Leadership, Finance, Operations, Sales, Planning, Problem Solving, Strategic thinking and Analysis, and many other valuable skills. This collection of skills was developed in partnership with a panel of subject matter experts who have worked in business leadership and managerial roles.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
author: Western Governors University
